item.title: Bangalore to Madurai Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Madurai can be a fascinating journey, rich in history, culture, and spirituality. Madurai, often referred to as the Athens of the East, is famous for its Meenakshi Amman Temple and vibrant street life. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Bangalore to Madurai Begin your journey early in the morning to make the most of your day. The distance between B
